name: iCloud for Windows 10.9.2
available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Samuel Groß of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted XML may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved size validation.

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: A malicious website may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A denial of service issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: Visiting a maliciously crafted website may reveal the sites a user has visited
advisories.description: The HTTP referrer header may be used to leak browsing history. The issue was resolved by downgrading all third party referrers to their origin.

cves.credit: Artur Janc, Krzysztof Kotowicz, Lukas Weichselbaum, and Roberto Clapis of Google Security Team

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: A top-level DOM object context may have incorrectly been considered secure
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.available: Windows 10 and later via the Microsoft Store
advisories.impact: A DOM object context may not have had a unique security origin
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.
